name: Princess Candy Sweet Christmas
description:
There's a new player in town, the wiggling, jiggling Princess and she's here to challenge you to a game of Princess Candy Sweet Christmas! Whatever your favorite moves, you better hope they're Jellylicious enough to take on the mighty Princess.
The unstoppably spreadable game! Princess Candy Sweet Christmas is full of delightful new game modes, Have you got the moves?


Princess Candy Sweet Christmas is completely free to play but in-game currency, to buy items such as extra moves or lives, will require payment with real money.

Princess Candy Sweet Christmas features:
• Over 90 Levels
• Tasty new booster
• Mezmerizing new sweet candy
• Easy and fun to play, yet challenging to fully master
